name: Goblin Gearshop
description: The orcs have started a war and are trying to take over the world! Gather your friends and smelt, mold and forge your own weapons to craft an end to this war!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual Core @2.00GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 8730 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox controller(s) necessary for multiplayer.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual Core @2.60GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 260X DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox controller(s) necessary for multiplayer.
